entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 08:10 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023
